# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a scope from the given string.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The name of the scope.

## Discussion

Typically you use one of the predefined scopes, like [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorization/Scope/email], instead of initializing one from a string.

## Creating a Scope

- **init(_:)**: Creates a scope from the given string.
